ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced ore processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of an arc furnace will allow the processing of ores such as ilmenite and cobalt and produce more advanced alloys. Allows you to create an electric arc furnace to produce cobalt, nickel, chromium and palladium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Duty Alloys
ResearchProjectDef.description: The study of alloys will create new generation alloys that are many times superior to current ones. Allows you to create plasteel and titanium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gas industry
ResearchProjectDef.description: It opens up the possibility of producing gas and processing it in a special gas machine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electricity and gas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use gas energy to generate electricity. Allows you to create a gas turbine to produce energy from gas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gas transportation and storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to better transport and store gas. Allows you to create a large tanker and gas cylinders.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hydrogen production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to produce hydrogen using steam conversion of natural gas.
